entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
